author: sandygao
msg: 1. We can access anySimpleType directly from the SchemaGrammar class.
This is more efficient than looking it up in a hashtable by name.
2. After "getGlobalDecl", we need to check whether the retuned type is a
simpleType, before cast it to XSSimpleType.

author: sandygao
msg: Updating error messages for simple types.

author: sandygao
msg: According to the schema spec, it's an error if included or redefined documents can't be found. But it's ok if an imported document is not found.
An warning is issued in the latter case.

author: sandygao
msg: Performance improvement: statically create one instance of the template
base uri, instead of creating one whenever "getActualValue" is called.

author: sandygao
msg: were not recognized by the standard configuration.
Now it's fixed. Thanks to Gopal's patch.
